version_description:
Plenty of improvements and bug fixes, including:

- improved hologram colour (when you're not using the experimental "Dynamic colour correction" option in Settings.
- you can now rotate holograms in landscape

EXCLUSIVE SPIDER-MAN UPDATE Holo features a variety of holograms inspired by Spider-Man: Homecoming.  Now you can mix your friendly neighborhood Spider-Man into your own adventures!  Don’t miss the movie in theaters July 7th!

- fixed a flash of the empty-screen placeholder in the Featured and Popular tabs after opening Browse
- we have fixed a bug where you could be logged-out after coming back to the app after a period of inactivity
- some minor UI tweaks and performance enhancements

Added landscape support to gallery and when previewing movies and photos.
Improved colour rendition of Holos.
Also fixed a few little bugs.

We have moved the playback controls to the bottom of the screen so they are easier to use with your thumb. We also added an indicator to show the progress of a Holo's animation. This should help your timing when you start or stop recording a video.
We have made some small UI tweaks and performance improvements.

The update you've all been waiting for: this version of Holo uses ARKit on supported devices running iOS 11 (iPhone 6S and above).

On older devices and devices running iOS 10 the previous placement method is used.

New features:

* double-tap a Holo to scale to life-size. Double-tap again to fit-to-screen. (iOS 11-only)
* two-finger rotation is now supported
* tap to move a Holo to a new position (dragging still works too)

– Bug fix: Holograms would not appear after restoring from a backup.

– Improved notification support.
We have improved the layout of all screens so that Holo looks great on all phones.

We have improved the design of the camera controls and drawer.
We also made many tweaks to improve the look of all screens.
Fixed some visual bugs that appeared in iOS 11.2.

Selfie mode! Now you can take pictures with your favorite influencers. The all-new design is optimized for taking pictures with the front facing camera that you can post to social media. Choose from a mix of free and premium content to use for your posts.
